name: Adam Eve and Pumpkins
description:
This is a game developed in less than 72 hours for the MiniJam 89 (Mini Jam 89: Pumpkin - itch.io).

In Eden a snake tried to convince Eve to eat the forbidden fruit (apple) but Adam told her not to do so. She decided to decline the offer and eat pumpkins instead.

Collect all the pumpkins, avoid the apples (are forbidden of course) and the snakes (they are angry now).

Use A-D or Left-Right to move and W or Up to jump.

The game was developed entirely by me using SFML C++ Library and some free tools and assets.

SFML Library - SFML (sfml-dev.org)

Tiled - Tiled | Flexible level editor (mapeditor.org)

From OpenGameArt.org

Graphics:

https://opengameart.org/content/12-roughlyanimated-isometric-characters

https://opengameart.org/content/apple-3

https://opengameart.org/content/32x32px-5-colors-pumpkins

https://opengameart.org/content/snake-rework

https://opengameart.org/content/nature-tileset

Sounds:

https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Music:

Fonts from Google Fonts:
